submittedOn.description: The date the deductions were added. It must be provided in the format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ

seafarers.description: Financial details about deductions and time spent working on a ship.

customerReference.description: A reference the user supplies to identify the record.

amountDeducted.description: Deduction from Seafarers' Earnings. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

nameOfShip.description: The name of the ship worked on.

fromDate.description: The date work started in the format YYYY-MM-DD

toDate.description: The date work ended in the format: YYYY-MM-DD

items.description: A list of endpoint links that indicate possible actions related to the current resource

href.description: The relative url of the endpoint

method.description: The HTTP method type for the endpoint

rel.description: A label for the endpoint, which describes how it is related to the current resource. The rel will be self where the action is retrieval of the same resource
